data.name: ChangeDefaultConfirm
data.value: Changing the default language will affect how the application behaves and should be configured during initial setup.

data.name: RemoveLanguageConfirm
data.value: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the language {{ currentDelete.title }} and all of its translations. Any sites that have selected {{ currentDelete.title }} as their language will be assigned the default language.
